Lock Haven University is able to provide health care to the students at no charge for office visits.

Clinic Hours:
Monday – Thursday:
		8:00 A.M. – 8:00 P.M.

Friday:
		8:00 A.M. – 5:00 P.M.

Saturday:
		10:00A.M. – 2:00 P.M
		(Limited Services)

Welcome to the LHU Companion App!

We did this project because we wanted future students to have an easier time navigating campus, knowing what events are happening, and to find resources they will need to submit to the school.

LHU Companion is an application for everyone, new or current.

We hope you will find it very helpful.
Thank You.
